item.title: [Summary] CoDeF: Content Deformation Fields for Temporally Consistent Video Processing
item.description: TL;DR A new video representation by (i) a canonical image that aggregates the static contents and (ii) a temporal deformation field that reconstructs the video frames when applied to the static image. Problem statements Video processing comes at a high cost,and naively processing frames results in poor cross-frame consistency. Method High level objective. The proposed representations should have the following characteristics: Fitting capability for faithful video reconstruction. Semantic correctness of the canonical image to ensure the performance of image processing algorithms.
